nodes.text: KR2-M80 was an astromech droid operating in the spice mines of Kessel more than a decade prior to the Battle of Yavin. The droid featured a silver dome, and white and yellow plating. It used an Intellex IV droid brain.

This droid was first seen in Rogue One: A Star Wars Story as R2-M80 and later renamed with a prefixed "K" for Solo: A Star Wars Story.[source?] The droid was portrayed by Hassan Taj in Solo, who also portrayed JV-P12 in the same scene.
